QuestData.Title: An Audience With The Archmage
QuestData.Description: Your Arcane Sanctum is coming along nicely, commander.$B$BEverything's built to spec... except for one detail Gazlowe scrawled in at the bottom of the blueprint. "Don't forget to connect the sanctum to the ley line network!"$B$BI, uh... I have no idea how to do that.$B$BI'm sorry commander, but magic just isn't my thing. We did spot Archmage Khadgar and some Kirin Tor not far from here. To the east, up near the mountains.$B$BMaybe we should ask them for help?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Archmage Khadgar in Talador.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, so you've built an Arcane Sanctum! Splendid!$B$BTroubles connecting to the ley line network, I take it?
